node.html: Hey Buddy Club is The next generation of pet identification & ownership. Update your pet's vital information at any time without worry. Manage all of your pets with one simple, easy-to-use app.

It is an eCommerce platform to sell or buy fruits, vegetables, etc. It provided an easy interface for users to add their own products to sell in the marketplace. Frontend: Flutter, Provider, Firebase(Auth, FCM, Firestore, Crashlytics).

SalaryBook is a 100% free, safe, and easy-to-use employee attendance app. You can use it as an attendance app or register and keep a tab of your employees' attendance and work shifts. You can also use it as a salary book and record employee payroll and maintain effective advance payment management.

This is an Frontend side of Motofit Two wheeler vehicle service application that provides various service's option, part instalment to vehicle and pickup and drop service
